summary: The Advancing Research on Agricultural Soil Health Act of 2025 directs the Secretary of Agriculture to develop a standardized methodology for measuring soil carbon, provide technical assistance for voluntary soil carbon reporting, and create a Soil Carbon Inventory and Analysis Network. It also authorizes funding for research and demonstration projects related to soil health and carbon sequestration, including the development of predictive models. The bill aims to improve the monitoring and understanding of soil carbon for conservation and climate change mitigation purposes.
